data.title: 3rd Grade Teacher (Oklahoma City, OK)
data.meta_description: June 24, 2024 - Sacred Heart Catholic School in Oklahoma City, OK is seeking a full-time employee in primary education.
data.text:

Job Description

Sacred Heart Catholic School serves Hispanic families in PK4-8th grade in Oklahoma City. We are currently looking for a 3rd-grade teacher for the 2024-25 school year. We offer a competitive salary and benefits plan. We provide teacher support through PLCs, instructional coaching, professional development, and on-staff mentorship along with small class sizes and family engagement.

Qualifications:

Degree in Elementary education or compatible

Oklahoma Certification or ability to obtain within three years of employment

Embrace and uphold the mission, philosophy, virtues, and values of Sacred Heart Catholic School and the Catholic faith.

Integrate Catholic teachings and values into daily instruction and classroom activities, fostering spiritual growth and moral development.

A passion for educating elementary-age students, strong classroom management skills, and the ability to create a supportive and engaging learning environment.

Proficiency in technology, including Microsoft Office, Google Classroom, Planbook, and student information systems.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a commitment to collaboration and teamwork.

Preferred Qualifications:

Practicing Catholic in good standing and able to teach Catholic theology.

Previous experience teaching in Grades K-5 or experience student teaching.

Bilingual in Spanish & English

About the Employer

Sacred Heart Catholic School's mission is to create virtuous disciples through academic excellence and Catholic Tradition.
